section.para: The Opportunities list gives you a high-level view into the sales prospects and deals you are working on and trying to convert. You can use this screen to manage your Opportunitiesâ€•from creating new ones to deactivating the older ones you are no longer actively pursuing.
Here are some tips for using this screen:

listitem.para: Make sure to enable all the column headers, especially the "Amount" column which describes the monetary value of the Opportunity.
Look beyond the list of Opportunities you own by building custom search criteria. After you build a search, save it so you can use it again later.
